valid_articles.Title: Google Says Wait Until The August Core Update Is Complete To Make Calls On Effects

Google's John Mueller explained that you should not fully judge the effect of the current core update until it is fully done rolling out.

valid_articles.Title: How the Massive Google SEO Leak Plays Into the Marketplace for Search
valid_articles.Description: Utsav Gandhi discusses the findings of the May 2024 Google SEO leak, which gave analysts a novel, albeit speculative, look into how Google might choose to promote and demote content. The findings have possible implications for businesses and news organizations struggling to compete for views and suggest that transparency could become an increasing factor in the future search market as new, artificial intelligence-powered competitors enter the market.
